newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Estonia c.bank assets rise 1.6 pct in Feb.
newsitem.headline: Estonia c.bank assets rise 1.6 pct in Feb.

text.p: The assets of the central bank of Estonia rose 1.6 percent in February to 8.7 billion kroons from 8.6 billion kroons, the central bank said on Monday.
The bank added in a statement that convertible foreign currency increased by 1.8 percent to 7.5 billion kroons from 7.4 billion kroons.
The bank added that gold and foreign assets backing the kroon rose to 8.5 billion kroons from 8.3 billion kroons or by 1.9 percent.
ESTONIAN CENTRAL BANK ASSETS Feb '97 Jan '97 Feb '96
(All amounts are in billions of kroons)
